If you want to use double inputs, you need to instruct the module to use double weights and biases. You can do this by calling double() method on your model like this:
conv1 = th.nn.Conv2d(in_channels=1, out_channels=123, kernel_size=(2,100), stride=(1,1)).double()

Then the example will work.

body:
If you want to use `double` inputs, you need to instruct the module to use `double` weights and biases. You can do this by calling `double()` method on your model like this:
`conv1 = th.nn.Conv2d(in_channels=1, out_channels=123, kernel_size=(2,100), stride=(1,1)).double()`

Then the example will work.
